raw: * This class is a base class for the OO system defined by Class, Mixin
* and Interface. It contains helper which are basically needed to create the
* Classes which define the OO system.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: This class is a base class for the OO system defined by Class, Mixin and Interface. It contains helper which are basically needed to create the Classes which define the OO system.

raw: * Whether the given class exists
* @param name {String} class name to check
* @return {Boolean} true if class exists
* Returns the definition of the given property, if not redefined.
* Returns null if the property does not exist.
* @param clazz {Class} class to check
* @param name {String} name of the class to check for
* @return {Map|null} whether the object support the given event.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the definition of the given property, if not redefined. Returns null if the property does not exist.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: name {String} name of the class to check for
@param.description: name of the class to check for

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Map|null} whether the object support the given event.
@return.description: whether the object support the given event.

raw: * Whether a class has the given property
* @param clazz {Class} class to check
* @param name {String} name of the property to check for
* @return {Boolean} whether the class includes the given property.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Whether a class has the given property

@param.name: @param
@param.body: name {String} name of the property to check for
@param.description: name of the property to check for

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Boolean} whether the class includes the given property.
@return.description: whether the class includes the given property.

raw: * Returns the event type of the given event. Returns null if
* the event does not exist.
* @param clazz {Class} class to check
* @param name {String} name of the event
* @return {String|null} Event type of the given event.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the event type of the given event. Returns null if the event does not exist.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {String|null} Event type of the given event.
@return.description: Event type of the given event.

raw: * Whether a class supports the given event type
* @param clazz {Class} class to check
* @param name {String} name of the event to check for
* @return {Boolean} whether the class supports the given event.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Whether a class supports the given event type

@param.name: @param
@param.body: name {String} name of the event to check for
@param.description: name of the event to check for

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Boolean} whether the class supports the given event.
@return.description: whether the class supports the given event.

raw: * Returns the class or one of its super classes which contains the
* declaration of the given interface. Returns null if the interface is not
* specified anywhere.
* @param clazz {Class} class to look for the interface
* @param iface {Interface} interface to look for
* @return {Class|null} the class which directly implements the given interface

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the class or one of its super classes which contains the declaration of the given interface. Returns null if the interface is not specified anywhere.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: clazz {Class} class to look for the interface
@param.description: class to look for the interface

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Class|null} the class which directly implements the given interface
@return.description: the class which directly implements the given interface

raw: * Whether a given class or any of its super classes includes a given interface.
* This function will return "true" if the interface was defined
* in the class declaration ({@link qx.Class#define}) of the class
* or any of its super classes using the "implement"
* key.
* @param clazz {Class} class to check
* @param iface {Interface} the interface to check for
* @return {Boolean} whether the class includes the interface.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Whether a given class or any of its super classes includes a given interface. This function will return "true" if the interface was defined in the class declaration ({@link qx.Class#define}) of the class or any of its super classes using the "implement" key.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: iface {Interface} the interface to check for

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Boolean} whether the class includes the interface.
@return.description: whether the class includes the interface.

raw: * Returns a list of all mixins available in a given class.
* @param clazz {Class} class which should be inspected
* @return {Mixin[]} array of mixins this class uses

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns a list of all mixins available in a given class.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: clazz {Class} class which should be inspected

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Mixin[]} array of mixins this class uses
@return.description: array of mixins this class uses
